entity.name: AzarEmpireKing
entity.description: The Command Center from which units are produced, war plans are reviewed so that the Azaran Empire may expand. Has an attrition field, dealing minimal damage and preventing shield regenration, making sieging it difficult.

entity.name: AzaranSpaceman
entity.description: These ships form the frontline of the Azaran Empire. Weak but numerous, they try to swarm their enemy with the most basic weaponry possible, however can be greatly bolstered by commanders. Many weaknesses.

entity.name: AzaranTank
entity.description: Tanks made to beachhead into enemy territory where ordinary soldiers would be unable to make it through. Limited firepower however.

entity.name: AzaranLieutenant
entity.description: A distinguished soldier now in charge of a small amount of spacemen. Its main weapon blasts acid on foes, greatly increasing the common spaceman efficency.

entity.name: AzaranDefenseConstructor
entity.description: A constructor made by the Azaran Empire to give birth to a guard post in order to bolster defenses in the chosen system.

entity.name: AzaranMajor
entity.description: A distinguished lieutenant now in charge of a small amount of lieutenants. Its main weapon blasts acid on foes, greatly increasing the common spaceman efficency.

entity.name: AzaranGraviticAttractor
entity.description: Large movable structure made to intercept shots meant for other units. Greatly bolsters survivability of weaker units.

entity.name: AzaranRocketeers
entity.description: Elite troops that are able to make big holes in massive hulls.

entity.name: AzaranBasicConstructor
entity.description: A constructor made by the Azaran Empire to give birth to an unremarkable, but useful facility to bolster the might of the Empire.

entity.name: AzaranAdvancedConstructor
entity.description: A constructor made by the Azaran Empire to give birth to a remarkable facility showcasing the full technological prowess of the Empire.

entity.name: AzaranColonel
entity.description: A distinguished major now in charge of a small amount of majors. Its main weapon blasts acid on foes, greatly increasing the common spaceman efficency, and also creates its own platoon in battle.

entity.name: AzaranBattleship
entity.description: An average ship of the line, where average means without weaknesses.

entity.name: AzaranOverkillMachine
entity.description: A giant mech in space, extremely fast and tearing through hordes of ships while healing itself doing so.

entity.name: AzaranNovaBot
entity.description: A giant ship, slow but firing destructive beams in a cone while sometimes unleashing massive supernovas to deal tremendous damage.

entity.name: AzaranGrandGeneral
entity.description: A legend of war, with so many medals it constitutes the bulk of its armor. Greatly increases the damage of friendly units, and bolsters their damage though acid, and finally also creates its own company in battle.

entity.name: AzaranCompanySpaceman
entity.description: These ships form the frontline of the Azaran Empire. Made by a Colonel or a Grand General, these ships bare little resemblance to their weaker variant, despite retaining the same key characteristics.

entity.name: AzaranStorageFacility
entity.description: A facility dedicated to storage, increasing the maximum strength that the Azaran Empire can project in the galaxy.

entity.name: AzaranProductionFacility
entity.description: A facility dedicated to the production of parts and components or even training. Bolsters the production of the command center.

entity.name: AzaranCompressionFacility
entity.description: In this facility lies high tech components, themselves manufacturing other high tech components which are to be sent every 5 minutes to the command center where they will be used to permanently increase its storage capacity.

entity.name: AzaranInnovationFacility
entity.description: A research laboratory aiming to make more with less, its crew works tirelessly to send new processes and machines every 5 minutes through which the command center can produce more troops in the same amount of time.

entity.name: AzaranForcefieldProvider
entity.description: Ward produced by advanced facilities of the Azaran Empire to protect against sudden assaults on the facilities.

entity.name: AzaranPikeGuardPost
entity.description: Azaran defense armed with a cannon dangerous to highly armoured units. Has a weak tachyon beam to detect units on a planet, alongside a railcannon to protect its position from afar.

entity.name: AzaranSabotGuardPost
entity.description: Azaran defense armed with a weapon devastating to high mass targets. Has a weak tachyon beam to detect units on a planet, alongside a railcannon to protect its position from afar.

entity.name: AzaranConcussionGuardPost
entity.description: Azaran defense armed with missile launchers ideal against thinly armoured targets. Has a weak tachyon beam to detect units on a planet, alongside a railcannon to protect its position from afar.

entity.name: AzaranMLRSGuardPost
entity.description: Azaran defense armed with multiple rocket tubes for crowd control. Has a weak tachyon beam to detect units on a planet, alongside a railcannon to protect its position from afar.

entity.name: AzaranNucleophilicGuardPost
entity.description: Azaran defense armed with a laser cannon destructive to high energy usage targets. Has a weak tachyon beam to detect units on a planet, alongside a railcannon to protect its position from afar.

entity.name: HackedAzaranBattleship
entity.description: An average ship of the line, where average means without weaknesses. Stolen by our hackers.

entity.name: HackedAzaranGraviticAttractor
entity.description: Large movable structure made to intercept shots meant for other units. Greatly bolsters survivability of weaker units. Stolen by our hackers.

entity.name: HackedAzaranRocketeers
entity.description: Elite troops that are able to make big holes in massive hulls. Stolen by our hackers.

entity.name: HackedAzaranTank
entity.description: Tanks made to beachhead into ennemy territory where ordinary soldiers would be unable to make it through. Limited armament however. Stolen by our hackers.
